attributes.review: I never would have through this could happen to someone like me.😞 I downloaded this app to learn and fully support the big orange 🍊. But as soon as I opened the app I felt an immediate presence in my room.😲🤫that’s when the chanting started. TRUMP 2020. TRUMP 2020. It would not stop😭😭out of fear I immediately deleted the app.  The immediate pressure I felt released form my body and I felt over all great again. Terrible app.
attributes.title: I’m so devastated😭

attributes.review: I downloaded the app only to discover the app crashing on me multiple times. I tried deleting the app and downloaded it again multiple times but it would still crash immediately. I even tried completely turning off my phone after I downloaded the app each time, awful quality.
attributes.title: So many glitches

attributes.review: i got this app because i am a supporter of trump and i love what he has done for our country. so of course i had to get this app! once i got it, my phone started to crash and glitch. it would log me out of my accounts on other apps. And i would like to mention, i love trump no matter what but it just upset me that something with his name in it, is breaking my phone. thank you
attributes.title: not so good...

attributes.review: I got this app thinking I was going to have an educational tour on Trump 2020✨. After about 5 minutes i started to feel sick and walked out of my room to catch my breath. Even my dog had to leave because she started feeling depressed😔. I just want to say that this app is very terrible and bunker boy🍊 should go back and review this because myself and many other obviously are not happy😤.
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: the app sent my autistic 5 year old son share mail and bullied him i thought i could trust our wonderful president but i can’t anymore the app also tracks my location when i’m not using it and take up so much battery life the app also showed vile photos of trumps nudes with the caption “NOW THIS IS AMERICA” as an insult to donald glovers song “this is america” i feel disgusted by this app
attributes.title: absolutely disgusting

attributes.review: My family and I now have to do therapy due to this is app. This app is an absolute -10/10 and I am patiently waiting for the moment where this man is no longer our president so that I may slap him with every bit of my soul. This app also caused kidney failure, and summoned a demon upon my house that is now causing all types of chaos. Long story short this app will absolutely ruin your life DO NOT DOWNLOAD. Thank you for your time.
attributes.title: F*!?k Donald Trump

attributes.review: What more do I need to say? If you are a Republican please trust these reviews. I’ve downloaded it myself and it has nothing to do with Trump so Republicans don’t even waste your time downloading this. All of the bad reviews are real. I have experienced the bugs, bullying, oppression, and harassment all of these reviews talk about. Stay safe and avoid this app, leave a 1 star review so nobody dies from downloading this.
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: I downloaded the app thinking It was going to update me with Trump’s re-election. As soon as I downloaded the app I texted the number to get notifications to my phone. Instead of texting me notifications about Trump, the bots threatened to scalp and kill me. They also threatened to body slam me if I didn’t vote for trump. My phone started glitching and my phone started heating up. I started to get so scared I deleted the app.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP🤢

attributes.review:
I downloaded this horrendous app so I could try to keep up with news. What’s on this app is not news, it’s literally just Tr*mp posting videos of bad makeup and self tanning tutorials that nobody cares about. It also gave my phone a terrible virus that crashes all my apps and I can barely write this review. Anyway, if you want actual news, listen to NPR, just not this or Fox News. 

Xoxo
Gossip girl 💋
attributes.title: Actual fake news
